com.inlocomedia.android.ads.profile

Class UserProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inlocomedia.android.core.serialization.json.JsonableModel
      • com.inlocomedia.android.core.serialization.json.PersistentJsonableModel
        • com.inlocomedia.android.ads.profile.UserProfile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.inlocomedia.android.core.serialization.json.Jsonable, java.io.Serializable

    public class UserProfile
extends com.inlocomedia.android.core.serialization.json.PersistentJsonableModel
    This class is used to store the user profile data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile()
        Create a user profile with empty values for the advertisement targeting.

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile(UserProfile.Gender gender,
                   @Nullable
                   java.util.Date birthdate)
        Create a user profile with age and gender for the advertisement targeting.
        Parameters:
        gender - the gender of the target, if not known, set UserProfile.Gender.Undefined
        birthdate - the birth date of the target, if not known, set null

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile(UserProfile.Gender gender,
                   int minAge,
                   int maxAge)
        Create a user profile with gender and an age range for the advertisement targeting.
        Parameters:
        gender - the gender of the target, if not known, set UserProfile.Gender.Undefined
        maxAge - the maximum age of the target, if not known, set AGE_UNDEFINED
        minAge - the minimum age of the target, if not known, set AGE_UNDEFINED

    • Method Detail

      • getSavedProfile

        @Nullable
public static UserProfile getSavedProfile(android.content.Context context)
        Get the default user profile that was saved on the save(Context) method. If none user profile was saved, will be returned null.
        Parameters:
        context - a context.
        Returns:
        the default user profile, or null if none user profile was saved.
